COMMIT.MESSAGE: [now dev] Render directory listing for Now v2 projects Before directory listings only worked for "all static" deployments since `now dev` would shell out to `serve-handler` to do the rendering. Now the directory listing rendering logic is moved into `now dev` which allows projects with Lambdas to also serve the directory listing (previously they would just 404). This removes the special-casing of "all static" deployments so that there's only one code path. Fixes #2161. Fixes #2417.
